metadata.title: CVE-2024-10026 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A weak hashing algorithm and small sizes of seeds/secrets in Google'sgVisor allowed for a remote attacker to calculate a local IP address and aper-boot identifier that could aid in tracking of a device in certaincircumstances.

criterions.comment: golang-gvisor-gvisor package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
